help.title: Instruction
help.note1: * The app works only in active and background mode.
help.note2: * You need to grant permission to receive sms to be able to use the functions of the app.
help.content1:
--- TODOS --- 
• Catch the sms sent to your device. 
• Filter it by `Keyword` (text or regex). 
• If matched, the app will grab your device_id and continue or it will ignore the sms. 
• Create a `signature` by using MD5 with device_id, sms content, phone_number, `Secret key` to hash your data. 
• Send all the params to the `API` (you entered).
help.content5: * NOTE: if any fail (network error, server error,..) in the execution of the api request, the request will be automatically retry 3 times with interval 30s each.
